concept.title: Concept
concept.shortdesc: 本文介绍什么是概念Concept, 它的核心部件有哪些？

conbody.p: The DITA Concept topic type is meant to provide conceptual information to support the performance of tasks. Concepts may include extended definitions of terms, expositions of background information, descriptions of systems and objects, and other content that helps to build a user's understanding of the tasks to be performed.
